title: Lou's Flu
description: Oh no, Lou has the flu! With just one sneeze, Lou sets off a series of events that leads to the whole household being bedridden. In Lou's Flu students will enjoy a humorous and informative story about how one group of siblings passes around the flu. Use this story to teach students how to identify cause-and-effect relationships and to accurately retell.
reviewWords: aching, flu, groaning, moaning, sneezing, wheezing
comprehension: Cause and Effect                : Identify cause-and-effect relationships
grammar: Interrogative Sentences                : Recognize and use interrogative sentences
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency words also, not, what
